Catalano.MachineLearning.Performance

Class LeaveOneOutCrossValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.MachineLearning.Performance.LeaveOneOutCrossValidation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IValidation, IRegressionValidation

    public class LeaveOneOutCrossValidation
extends java.lang.Object
implements IValidation, IRegressionValidation
    Leave One Out cross validation. Leave one out for validation and the rest for train.
